body:
reported by beholder from forum:

add triggers for discarding and card drawing, so cards like Liliana's Caress and Underworld Dreams are possible
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Triggers for discarding and card drawing
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on July 29, 2011 22:36:28_

reported by beholder from forum:

add triggers for discarding and card drawing, so cards like Liliana's Caress and Underworld Dreams are possible

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=37_
